Recipes.name: Chocolate Oreo Milkshake
Recipes.ingredients: 2 cups milk (dairy or non-dairy), 4 Oreo cookies, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, 2 tablespoons sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups vanilla ice cream, whipped cream (for topping), crushed Oreo cookies (for garnish)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Place the milk, Oreo cookies, cocoa powder, sugar, vanilla extract, and vanilla ice cream in a blender.
2. Blend on high speed until smooth and creamy.
3. Pour the milkshake into glasses.
4. Top with whipped cream.
5. Garnish with crushed Oreo cookies.
6. Serve and enjoy!

Recipes.name: Cappuccino
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup strong brewed coffee, 1 cup milk (dairy or non-dairy), 2 tablespoons sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, cocoa powder or cinnamon (for garnish)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Brew a cup of strong coffee.
2. In a saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat until hot but not boiling.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the sugar and vanilla extract.
4. Pour the hot coffee into a mug.
5. Add the sugar and vanilla mixture to the hot milk and whisk until frothy.
6. Pour the frothy milk over the coffee.
7. Sprinkle cocoa powder or cinnamon on top for garnish.
8. Serve and enjoy!

Recipes.name: Fruit Smoothie
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup frozen mixed berries, 1 ripe banana, 1 cup plain yogurt, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1 tablespoon honey (optional)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Place the frozen mixed berries, banana, yogurt, orange juice, and honey (if using) into a blender. 
2. Blend on high speed until smooth and creamy. 
3. If the smoothie is too thick, add more orange juice or water to thin it out. 
4. Taste and adjust the sweetness with additional honey if desired. 
5. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

Recipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
Recipes.ingredients:
200g spaghetti
2 large eggs
60g Pecorino Romano cheese, grated
100g pancetta or guanciale, diced
2 cloves garlic, minced
Salt and black pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
2. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and grated Pecorino Romano cheese.
3. In a skillet, cook the pancetta or guanciale until crispy. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
4. Drain the cooked spaghetti, reserving some pasta water.
5. Add the hot spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta and garlic, tossing to coat the pasta.
6. Remove the skillet from heat and quickly pour in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing continuously to create a creamy sauce.
7. Add a splash of pasta water if needed to achieve desired consistency.
8. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
9. Serve immediately with additional grated Pecorino Romano on top.

Recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Recipes.ingredients: 250g spaghetti, 300g ground beef, 1 onion (diced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 can crushed tomatoes, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried basil, salt and pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large pan, brown the ground beef over medium heat. Add the diced onion and minced garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Stir well to combine. Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
4. Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti. Enjoy!

Recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Recipes.ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 150g pancetta or guanciale, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 large eggs, 50g grated Pecorino Romano cheese, 50g grated Parmesan cheese, Salt, Ground black pepper
Recipes.instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain well.

2. In a large skillet, cook the pancetta or guanciale over medium heat until crispy. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.

3. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.

4. Remove the skillet from heat and add the cooked spaghetti. Toss to coat the spaghetti with the pancetta and garlic.

5. Pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti and quickly toss until the heat from the pasta cooks the eggs, creating a creamy sauce.

6. Serve immediately, garnished with additional grated cheese and black pepper, if desired.

Recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
Recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Fresh basil leaves, Olive oil, Salt
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to the highest temperature (usually around 500°F or 260°C).

2. Roll out the pizza dough into a round shape and transfer it to a baking sheet or pizza stone.

3. Spread a layer of tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.

4. Tear the mozzarella cheese into small pieces and distribute them over the sauce.

5. Place fresh basil leaves on top of the cheese.

6. Drizzle olive oil over the pizza and sprinkle a pinch of salt.

7. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

8. Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly before slicing and serving.

Recipes.name: Hawaiian Pizza
Recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, pineapple chunks
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to the recommended temperature for your pizza dough.
2. Roll out the pizza dough into a round shape.
3. Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
4. Sprinkle a generous amount of mozzarella cheese on top.
5. Place ham slices and pineapple chunks on the cheese.
6. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for the recommended time or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
7. Remove from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and slice. Enjoy your delicious Hawaiian Pizza!

Recipes.name: Chicken Peri Peri Pizza
Recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, peri peri sauce, cooked chicken, red onion, bell peppers, mozzarella cheese
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to the recommended temperature for your pizza dough.
2. Roll out the pizza dough into a round shape.
3. Spread peri peri sauce evenly over the dough.
4. Sprinkle a generous amount of mozzarella cheese on top.
5. Arrange cooked chicken, sliced red onion, and bell peppers on the cheese.
6. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for the recommended time or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
7. Remove from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and slice. Enjoy your flavorful Chicken Peri Peri Pizza!

Recipes.name: Vegan Pizza
Recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, vegan cheese, mushrooms, bell peppers, olives, onions
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to the recommended temperature for your pizza dough.
2. Roll out the pizza dough into a round shape.
3. Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
4. Sprinkle a generous amount of vegan cheese on top.
5. Add sliced mushrooms, bell peppers, olives, and onions as desired.
6. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for the recommended time or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted.
7. Remove from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and slice. Enjoy your tasty Vegan Pizza!

Recipes.name: Caprese Salad
Recipes.ingredients: 4 ripe tomatoes, 8 oz fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, black pepper
Recipes.instructions:
1. Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella cheese into rounds.
2. Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a platter, alternating them.
3. Place a basil leaf on top of each tomato and mozzarella slice.
4. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
5. Sprinkle with salt and black pepper.
6. Serve and enjoy!

Recipes.name: Chicken Piccata
Recipes.ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, all-purpose flour, salt, black pepper, butter, olive oil, garlic, chicken broth, lemon juice, capers, fresh parsley
Recipes.instructions:
1. Pound the chicken breasts to an even thickness.
2. In a shallow dish, mix flour, salt, and black pepper.
3. Dredge each chicken breast in the flour mixture, shaking off excess.
4. In a large skillet, melt butter with olive oil over medium heat.
5. Add the chicken breasts and cook until golden brown on both sides.
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
7. In the same skillet, add garlic and cook for about 1 minute.
8. Stir in chicken broth, lemon juice, and capers, scraping up any browned bits.
9. Bring to a simmer and cook until the sauce thickens slightly.
10. Return the chicken to the skillet and simmer for a few minutes to heat through.
11. Garnish with fresh parsley.
12. Serve with pasta or rice.
13. Enjoy!

Recipes.name: Bruschetta
Recipes.ingredients: Baguette or Italian bread, ripe tomatoes, garlic, fresh basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, black pepper
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Slice the baguette or Italian bread into 1/2-inch thick slices.
3. Place the bread slices on a baking sheet and brush one side with olive oil.
4. Bake in the preheated oven for about 8-10 minutes or until toasted.
5. Meanwhile, dice the tomatoes and finely chop the garlic.
6. In a bowl, combine the tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
7. Remove the toasted bread from the oven and let it cool slightly.
8. Spoon the tomato mixture onto the toasted side of each bread slice.
9. Serve immediately.
10. Enjoy!

Recipes.name: Lasagna
Recipes.ingredients:
9 lasagna noodles
1 lb (450 g) ground beef
1/2 cup (1 medium) onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can (14 oz / 400 g) crushed tomatoes
1 can (6 oz / 170 g) tomato paste
2 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped
1 tablespoon fresh oregano, chopped
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon black pepper
2 cups (500 g) ricotta cheese
2 cups (200 g) shredded mozzarella cheese
1/2 cup (50 g) grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 cup (15 g) fresh parsley, chopped
1 egg, beaten
Salt and black pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic and cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, chopped basil, chopped oregano, salt, and black pepper. Simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. In a bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, shredded mozzarella cheese, grated Parmesan cheese, chopped parsley, beaten egg, salt, and black pepper.
6. Spread a thin layer of the meat sauce in the bottom of a baking dish.
7. Arrange 3 lasagna noodles on top of the sauce. Spread a layer of the cheese mixture over the noodles.
8. Repeat the layers, ending with a layer of meat sauce on top.
9. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
10. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
11. Allow the lasagna to cool for a few minutes before serving. Slice and serve.

Recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
Recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts (sliced), 1 bell pepper (sliced), 1 onion (sliced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 tablespoon cornstarch (dissolved in 2 tablespoons water)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Heat the sesame oil in a large pan or wok over high heat.
2. Add the sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the sliced bell pepper and onion. Cook until slightly softened.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
5. Return the cooked chicken to the pan. Add the soy sauce and oyster sauce. Stir well to coat the ingredients.
6. Pour in the dissolved cornstarch and water mixture. Stir until the sauce thickens.
7. Serve the chicken stir-fry over rice or noodles. Enjoy!

Recipes.name: Piri Piri Chicken
Recipes.ingredients: 4 chicken legs or thighs, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 tablespoons piri piri sauce, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, salt and pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine the minced garlic, lemon juice, piri piri sauce, paprika, dried oregano, dried thyme, salt, and pepper.
2. Place the chicken legs or thighs in a ziplock bag and pour the marinade over them.
3. Seal the bag and massage the marinade into the chicken, ensuring it is well coated.
4. Place the bag in the refrigerator and let the chicken marinate for at least 1 hour, or overnight for more intense flavor.
5. Preheat the grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
6. Brush the grates with olive oil to prevent sticking.
7. Remove the chicken from the marinade, allowing any excess marinade to drip off.
8. Grill the chicken for about 6-8 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C) and the juices run clear.
9. Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
10. Serve the Piri Piri Chicken hot with your favorite side dishes or salads.

Recipes.name: Chicken Curry
Recipes.ingredients: 1 lb chicken (cut into pieces), 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 1 onion (chopped), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tbsp ginger (minced), 2 tbsp curry powder, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 can coconut milk, 1 cup chicken broth, 2 potatoes (peeled and cubed), Salt and pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, minced garlic, and minced ginger. Cook until the onion is soft and translucent.

2. Add the chicken pieces to the pot and cook until browned on all sides.

3. Stir in the curry powder and turmeric powder, coating the chicken and onions.

4. Pour in the coconut milk and chicken broth. Bring to a simmer.

5. Add the cubed potatoes to the pot. Cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the potatoes are tender.

6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

7. Serve the Chicken Curry hot, with steamed rice or naan bread.

Recipes.name: Chicken Enchiladas
Recipes.ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded; 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 1/2 cup diced onion; 1/2 cup diced bell pepper; 1 can enchilada sauce; 8 tortillas
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a bowl, mix together the cooked chicken, shredded cheese, diced onion, and diced bell pepper.
3. Warm the tortillas in the microwave or on a stovetop to make them pliable.
4. Spoon the chicken mixture onto each tortilla and roll it up tightly.
5. Place the rolled tortillas in a baking dish.
6. Pour the enchilada sauce over the rolled tortillas.
7. Sprinkle additional cheese on top if desired.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Serve the chicken enchiladas hot.

Recipes.name: Pad Thai
Recipes.ingredients: 8 oz rice noodles, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 eggs (beaten), 8 oz shrimp (peeled and deveined), 1 cup bean sprouts, 2 green onions (chopped), 1/4 cup crushed peanuts, 2 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 tbsp brown sugar, 1/2 lime (juiced)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Soak the rice noodles in warm water for 10-15 minutes until softened.

2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.

3. Push the garlic to the side of the pan and add the beaten eggs. Scramble the eggs until cooked through.

4. Add the shrimp to the pan and cook until pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes.

5. Push the shrimp to the side of the pan and add the soaked rice noodles, bean sprouts, and chopped green onions. Stir everything together.

6. In a small bowl, whisk together the fish sauce, soy sauce, tamarind paste, brown sugar, and lime juice. Pour the sauce over the noodles and stir to coat everything evenly.

7. Continue cooking for 2-3 minutes until the noodles are heated through.

8. Serve the Pad Thai hot, garnished with crushed peanuts and additional lime wedges if desired.

Recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
Recipes.ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, 4 sheets nori (seaweed), Assorted fillings (such as cucumber, avocado, crab sticks, or raw fish), Soy sauce for dipping, Wasabi and pickled ginger (optional)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Rinse the sushi rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Cook the rice according to package instructions.

2. Once the rice is cooked, let it cool slightly and season with sushi vinegar or a mixture of rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.

3. Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat or a piece of plastic wrap.

4. Wet your hands and take a handful of sushi rice. Spread it evenly on the nori, leaving a small border at the top.

5. Add your desired fillings in a line across the center of the rice.

6. Use the sushi mat or plastic wrap to tightly roll the sushi, applying gentle pressure to shape it.

7. Wet a sharp knife and slice the sushi roll into bite-sized pieces.

8. Serve the Sushi Rolls with soy sauce for dipping. Wasabi and pickled ginger can be served on the side if desired.

Recipes.name: Bibimbap
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup cooked rice, 1/2 cup sautéed vegetables (carrots, spinach, mushrooms, bean sprouts, etc.), 1 fried egg, 2 tablespoons gochujang (Korean chili paste), 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, sliced green onions for garnish
Recipes.instructions:
1. Prepare the rice and set aside.

2. Sauté the vegetables separately in a little oil until cooked.

3. Fry the egg sunny-side up or as desired.

4. In a small bowl, mix together gochujang, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar, and sesame seeds to make the sauce.

5. In a large bowl, place the cooked rice at the bottom. Arrange the sautéed vegetables on top of the rice.

6. Place the fried egg on one side of the bowl.

7. Drizzle the sauce over the vegetables and rice.

8. Garnish with sliced green onions.

9. Mix everything together thoroughly before eating.

10. Enjoy your delicious Bibimbap!

Recipes.name: Korean Beef Bulgogi
Recipes.ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced|1/2 cup soy sauce|2 tablespoons brown sugar|2 tablespoons sesame oil|2 cloves garlic, minced|1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger|2 tablespoons vegetable oil|1 onion, thinly sliced|2 green onions, cut into 2-inch pieces|1 carrot, julienned|1/2 teaspoon black pepper|Cooked rice, for serving
Recipes.instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, minced garlic, and grated ginger. Stir until the sugar is dissolved.

2. Add the thinly sliced beef to the marinade and toss to coat. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes, or refrigerate overnight for better flavor.

3. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.

4. Add the marinated beef to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes until the beef is browned and cooked through.

5. Add the sliced onion, green onions, and julienned carrot to the skillet. Stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp.

6. Season with black pepper and stir to combine.

7. Serve the beef bulgogi over cooked rice.

Enjoy your delicious Korean Beef Bulgogi!
Recipes.time_taken: Preparation time: 30 minutes | Cooking time: 10 minutes

Recipes.name: Butter Chicken
Recipes.ingredients: 500g boneless chicken, 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 onion (finely chopped), 2 tomatoes (pureed), 2 teaspoons ginger-garlic paste, 1 teaspoon red chili powder, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon garam masala, 1/2 cup cream, salt to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate the chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, and salt for 1 hour.
2. Heat butter in a pan and sauté the chopped onions until golden brown.
3. Add the tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes.
4. Add the marinated chicken and cook until tender and cooked through.
5. Sprinkle garam masala and mix well.
6. Add cream and simmer for 2 minutes.
7. Serve hot with naan or rice.
Recipes.time_taken:
Preparation time: 1 hour
Cooking time: 30 minutes

Recipes.name: Masala Dosa
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup rice, 1/2 cup urad dal, 1/4 cup chana dal, 1/4 cup toor dal, 1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds, salt to taste, oil for cooking
Recipes.instructions:
1. Wash and soak rice, urad dal, chana dal, toor dal, and fenugreek seeds together for 5-6 hours.
2. Grind the soaked ingredients to a smooth batter.
3. Add salt and mix well.
4. Ferment the batter overnight or for 8-10 hours.
5. Heat a tawa or griddle and spread a ladleful of batter in a circular motion to make a thin dosa.
6. Drizzle oil around the edges and cook until golden brown.
7. Fold the dosa and serve hot with chutney and sambar.
Recipes.time_taken:
Preparation time: 6-7 hours (including soaking and fermentation)
Cooking time: 15 minutes per dosa

Recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
Recipes.ingredients: 1 kg chicken, 3 cups basmati rice, 2 onions (sliced), 2 tomatoes (chopped), 2 tablespoons biryani masala, 1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste, 1 teaspoon red chili powder, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/4 cup mint leaves, 1/4 cup coriander leaves, 4 cups water, salt to taste, ghee or oil for cooking
Recipes.instructions:
1. Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes.
2. Heat ghee or oil in a large pot and sauté the sliced onions until golden brown.
3. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for a minute.
4. Add chicken pieces and cook until they are no longer pink.
5. Add chopped tomatoes, biryani masala, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
6. In a separate pot, boil water and add soaked rice. Cook until the rice is 70% cooked. Drain the water.
7. Layer half of the partially cooked rice over the chicken in the pot.
8. Sprinkle mint leaves and coriander leaves.
9. Layer the remaining rice on top.
10. Cover the pot with a tight lid and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes.
11. Serve hot with raita or salan.
Recipes.time_taken:
Preparation time: 30 minutes
Cooking time: 45 minutes

Recipes.name: Jollof Rice
Recipes.ingredients: 2 cups long-grain rice, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 onion (diced), 1 red bell pepper (diced), 1 green bell pepper (diced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 teaspoon thyme, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 2 cups chicken or vegetable broth, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, salt and pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Rinse the rice under cold water to remove excess starch.
2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat.
3. Add the diced onion, bell peppers, and minced garlic. Sauté until the vegetables are softened.
4. Stir in the tomato sauce, thyme, curry powder, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper.
5. Cook the sauce for a few minutes until the flavors meld together.
6. Add the rice to the pot and stir to coat it with the sauce.
7. Pour in the chicken or vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let the rice simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
9. Remove the pot from the heat and let the rice rest for a few minutes before fluffing it with a fork.
10. Serve the Jollof Rice hot and enjoy!

Recipes.name: Injera
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup teff flour, 2 cups water, salt (to taste)
Recipes.instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the teff flour and water until well combined.
2. Cover the bowl and let the mixture ferment for at least 24 hours.
3. After fermentation, add salt to taste and stir the batter.
4. Heat a non-stick pan or skillet over medium heat.
5. Pour a ladleful of the batter onto the pan and spread it in a circular motion to form a thin pancake.
6. Cook for a few minutes until the edges start to lift and the surface is cooked.
7. Remove the injera from the pan and repeat the process with the remaining batter.
8. Serve the injera with your favorite Ethiopian dishes.

Recipes.name: Ugali
Recipes.ingredients: 2 cups maize flour, 4 cups water
Recipes.instructions:
1. Bring the water to a boil in a large saucepan.
2. Gradually add the maize flour to the boiling water while stirring continuously.
3. Reduce the heat to low and continue stirring until the mixture thickens and forms a stiff dough.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the ugali cool slightly.
5. Wet your hands with water to prevent sticking, then shape the ugali into individual portions or a large mound.
6. Serve the ugali alongside dishes like sukuma wiki, nyama choma, or any other Kenyan meal.

Recipes.name: Koshari
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup rice, 1 cup brown lentils, 1 cup macaroni, 2 onions (sliced), 3 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups tomato sauce, 2 teaspoons cumin, salt and pepper (to taste)
Recipes.instructions:
1. Cook the rice, lentils, and macaroni separately according to their package instructions.
2. In a large pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
3. Add the sliced onions and cook until caramelized.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
5. Stir in the tomato sauce, cumin, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes.
6. To serve, layer the rice, lentils, and macaroni in a bowl or plate.
7. Top with the tomato sauce mixture and garnish with fried onions.
8. Enjoy the delicious flavors of Koshari, a popular Egyptian street food!

Recipes.name: Nshima
Recipes.ingredients: 2 cups white maize meal, 4 cups water
Recipes.instructions:
1. Bring the water to a boil in a large saucepan.
2. Gradually add the maize meal to the boiling water while stirring continuously.
3. Reduce the heat to low and continue stirring until the mixture thickens and forms a stiff porridge.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the nshima cool slightly.
5. Wet your hands with water to prevent sticking, then shape the nshima into individual portions or a large mound.
6. Serve the nshima as a staple accompaniment to Zambian dishes like ndiwo (vegetable stew) or grilled meats.

Recipes.name: Bobotie
Recipes.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 2 slices bread (soaked in milk), 1 onion (finely chopped), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tablespoon curry powder, 1 tablespoon apricot jam, 1 tablespoon chutney, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/4 cup slivered almonds, 2 eggs, 1 cup milk, salt and pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, soaked bread, chopped onion, minced garlic, curry powder, apricot jam, chutney, lemon juice, raisins, slivered almonds, salt, and pepper.
3. Mix all the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and press it down evenly.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk.
6. Pour the egg mixture over the meat mixture, ensuring it is evenly distributed.
7. Bake the Bobotie in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and set.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.
9. Slice the Bobotie into squares or wedges and serve it warm with rice, chutney, and a side salad.

Recipes.name: Guacamole
Recipes.ingredients: 2 ripe avocados; 1/4 cup diced onion; 1/4 cup diced tomato; 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro; 1 tablespoon lime juice; Salt and pepper to taste
Recipes.instructions:
1. Cut the avocados in half, remove the pits, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
2. Mash the avocados with a fork or potato masher until desired consistency.
3. Add the diced onion, diced tomato, chopped cilantro, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
4. Mix everything together until well combined.
5. Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.
6. Serve the guacamole with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos, burritos, or salads.

Recipes.name: Beef Tacos
Recipes.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef; 1 packet taco seasoning; 1/2 cup water; Taco shells; Shredded lettuce; Diced tomatoes; Shredded cheese; Sour cream; Salsa
Recipes.instructions:
1. In a skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned.
2. Drain the excess grease from the skillet.
3. Add the taco seasoning and water to the skillet.
4. Simmer for a few minutes until the beef is well coated with the seasoning.
5. Warm the taco shells in the oven or microwave.
6. Fill each taco shell with the seasoned ground beef.
7. Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
8. Serve the beef tacos immediately.

Recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
Recipes.ingredients: 4 eggs, 1/4 cup milk, salt, pepper, butter
Recipes.instructions:
1. Crack the eggs into a bowl. 
2. Add milk, salt, and pepper to the bowl. 
3. Whisk the mixture until well combined. 
4. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt butter. 
5. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet. 
6. Stir continuously with a spatula until the eggs are cooked to your desired consistency. 
7. Remove from heat and serve hot.

Recipes.name: Pancakes
Recipes.ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup buttermilk, 1 large egg, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter (melted), cooking spray or additional butter for greasing
Recipes.instructions:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, egg, and melted butter. 
3. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and gently mix until just combined. 
4. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease with cooking spray or butter. 
5. Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake. 
6. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side until golden brown. 
7. Repeat with the remaining batter. 
8. Serve the pancakes hot with your favorite toppings.

Recipes.name: Tiramisu
Recipes.ingredients: Ladyfingers, Espresso coffee, Mascarpone cheese, Eggs, Sugar, Cocoa powder
Recipes.instructions:
1. Brew a strong cup of espresso coffee and let it cool.

2. In a bowl, whisk together the mascarpone cheese, egg yolks, and sugar until smooth and creamy.

3. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form.

4. Gently fold the beaten egg whites into the mascarpone mixture.

5. Dip each ladyfinger into the cooled espresso coffee and arrange them in a single layer in a serving dish.

6. Spread a layer of the mascarpone mixture over the soaked ladyfingers.

7. Repeat the layers of soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture, ending with a layer of mascarpone on top.

8. Dust the top of the tiramisu with cocoa powder.

9. Refrigerate the tiramisu for at least 4 hours or overnight to allow the flavors to meld together.

10. Serve chilled and enjoy!
